Claim: "Scientists suspect smallpox and the bubonic plague are trapped in Siberian ice."
Implication: "Human sickness has a long history of devastating people."
Referring expressions: Scientists, smallpox, bubonic plague, Siberian ice.  Human sickness, people
Formula: (exists a (exists b (exists d (IsSuspected(a) and IsTrappedIn(d,b))))) -> (exists e (exists f (IsHuman(e) and HasDevastated(f))))
